movies.title: Otto the Rhino
movies.plot: Topper finds the summer holidays a bit boring and feels a bit daft being crazy about a girl he can't make head or tail of. To add to his problems, Topper misses his dad, who is off sailing the seven seas or who knows - perhaps even further away than that. But one day, Topper finds something amazing, and suddenly life isn't quite so boring after all. He finds a pencil - not an ordinary pencil, mind - that wouldn't be special at all. No, this one can do magic! Together with his best friend, Viggo, Topper is about to discover all the incredible things this kind of pencil can be used for. Topper and Viggo live in the same old, red brick building. The ground floor is occupied by the Red Catfish Café owned by Viggo's dad, Mr Lion. Topper lives on the second floor - and it is here that he and Viggo draw a rhino on the wall - a yellow rhino with three horns. They don't have to wait long for something magical to happen. Moments later the rhino comes alive!
movies.simplePlot: Topper is an optimistic young boy with a vivid imagination. He is also in love with Cilla, but she thinks he's very crazy. One day Topper finds a pencil and draws a rhino that comes to live! This changes everything.

biography.bio: Nikolai Aamand is an actor, known for Otto the Rhino (2013), Børnenes Verden (2013) and Mops & Ollie (2013).
biography.name: Nikolai Aamand

biography.bio: Noah Crone Back is an actor, known for Otto the Rhino (2013).
biography.name: Noah Crone Back

biography.bio: Lars Brygmann was born on February 17, 1957 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is an actor, known for The Celebration (1998), Stealing Rembrandt (2003) and Terribly Happy (2008). He has been married to Katrine Brygmann Salomon since 2000.
biography.name: Lars Brygmann

biography.bio: Kaya Brüel was born on August 30, 1972 in Denmark. She is an actress, known for Jungle Jack (1993), Jungle Jack 2: La star de la jungle (1996) and Love Birds (2000). She has been married to Kenneth Kainz since 1999.
biography.name: Kaya Brüel

biography.bio: Rebecca Brüel was born on April 12, 1952. She is an actress, known for Aftenshowet (2007), Otto the Rhino (2013) and Det gode liv (2005). She has been married to Troels Trier since July 5, 1986. They have one child.
biography.name: Rebecca Brüel

biography.bio: Asta Danielsson is an actress, known for Otto the Rhino (2013).
biography.name: Asta Danielsson

biography.bio: Helle Dolleris was born on August 5, 1965 in Denmark as Helle Charlotte Dolleris. She is an actress and writer, known for The Celebration (1998), Flickering Lights (2000) and Pandaerne (2011).
biography.name: Helle Dolleris

biography.bio: Søs Egelind was born on November 13, 1958 in Denmark as Hanne Egelind. She is an actress and writer, known for The One and Only (1999), Jul i den gamle trædemølle (1990) and Lærkevej - til døden os skiller (2012). She is married to Björn Blixt. They have two children.
biography.name: Søs Egelind

biography.bio: Mikkel Brinch Hansen is an actor, known for Otto the Rhino (2013).
biography.name: Mikkel Brinch Hansen

biography.bio: Tom Jensen was born on November 30, 1965. He is known for his work on Allegro (2005), A Funny Man (2011) and Piggy (2012).
biography.name: Tom Jensen

biography.bio: Bodil Jørgensen was born on March 3, 1961 in Vejle, Denmark. She is an actress, known for Les idiots (1998), Les bouchers verts (2003) and Nothing's All Bad (2010). She has been married to Morten Søborg since November 18, 2005. They have one child. She was previously married to Henrik Sartou.
biography.name: Bodil Jørgensen

biography.bio: Kenneth Kainz was born on May 22, 1970 in Helsingør, Denmark. He is a director, known for The Shamer (2015), Rene hjerter (2006) and Parterapi (2010). He has been married to Kaya Brüel since 1999.
biography.name: Kenneth Kainz

biography.bio: Lasse Guldberg Kamper was born on April 14, 2000 in Copenhagen, Denmark. He is an actor, known for Un safari en folie! (2013), Karla & Katrine (2009) and Karla & Jonas (2010).
biography.name: Lasse Guldberg Kamper

biography.bio: Tommy Kenter has an incredible repertoire, and does all sorts of characters, from his goofy character Keld to his hard-of-hearing and very eccentric Fru Kristoff. Although preferably a comedy actor, he showed that he could do serious bits as well with Dance of the Polar Bears (1990). With Per Pallesen as Mathiesen and Tommy's corresponding character Fru Kristoff, he achieved legendary comedy status in the 80s. Just as people thought he was coming to the end of his career, he re-emerged as the fantastic Anton in Fukssvansen (2001), the nosy and very selfish neighbour.
biography.name: Tommy Kenter

biography.bio: Lars Knutzon was born on October 1, 1941 in Denmark. He is an actor and director, known for Gertrud (1964), Tidsrejsen (2014) and Det grå guld (2013).
biography.name: Lars Knutzon

categories.category: Best Children/Youth Film (Årets børne- og ungdomsfilm)
